### Exercise 2
```{r}
ggplot(data = arbuthnot, aes(x = year, y = girls)) + 
  geom_line()
```
### Exercise 3
```{r}
ggplot(data = arbuthnot, aes(x = year, y = boys)) + 
  geom_line()
```
```{r}
arbuthnot <- arbuthnot |>
  mutate(total = boys + girls)
```
```{r}
arbuthnot <- arbuthnot |>
  mutate(boy_prop = boys / total)
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = arbuthnot, aes(x = year, y = boy_prop)) + 
  geom_line()
```
